page.para: Look at this man. His hoe is too short.
Peo/ple tell him he is too tall. But what can he do?
He made a ver/y long han/dle for his hoe.
He made the door frames much high/er.
He made a ver/y long bed.
He bought a ver/y tall bi/cy/cle.
He made a ver/y high ta/ble, and a ver/y high stool.
Now he is hap/py in his tall house in the for/est.
